post.title: Digest - Week 2023/45
post.body:
ㅤ
### [Shopify/ruvy](https://github.com/Shopify/ruvy)
Ruvy: A Ruby to WebAssembly toolchain
ㅤ
### [Use Supabase - Expo Documentation](https://docs.expo.dev/guides/using-supabase/)
Add a Postgres Database and user authentication to your React Native app with Supabase.
ㅤ
### [Life is about choices - The Rhino Inquisitor](https://www.rhino-inquisitor.com/life-is-about-choices/)
Life is all about choices, and I have made quite a few throughout my career. But there are things you see and things you don't!
post.excerpt: Weekly digest of my readings and interesting topics. Week 45 of 2023.
